block.title: Configure Your Ziften Splunk application
block.text: All of the following configuration steps are currently optional.

block.title: (Optional) VirusTotal Setup for Ziften Splunk
block.text: In this section, you can chose to configure a VirusTotal API key. By doing so, your Ziften for Splunk application can corrilate your data to VirusTotal. In order for your application to utilize VirusTotal services, you must enter valid VirusTotal API key. You can register for a free API key at www.virustotal.com
